text: S'well is an insulated products company that is headquartered in Manhattan, New York. It is most known for its water bottles. == History == S'well was started by Sarah Kauss in 2010. She used $30,000 of her own money to start the company. From 2013 to 2014, the company made $10 million in sales. In 2016, Forbes reported that S'well had more than $100M in sales. In 2017, the company increased staff at its London headquarters and expanded to 65 countries worldwide. == References == Category:Companies based in New York City Category:2010 establishments in the United States
title: S'well
